annotation.spannedText: People at high risk of exposure to rabies, such as veterinarians, animal handlers, rabies laboratory workers, spelunkers, and rabies biologics production workers should be offered rabies vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: People at high risk of exposure to rabies, such as veterinarians, animal handlers, rabies laboratory workers, spelunkers, and rabies biologics production workers should be offered rabies vaccine

annotation.spannedText: booster doses should be given as needed

classMention.mentionClass: booster doses should be given as needed

annotation.spannedText: Anyone who has been bitten by an animal, or who otherwise may have been exposed to rabies, should clean the wound and see a doctor immediately

classMention.mentionClass: Anyone who has been bitten by an animal, or who otherwise may have been exposed to rabies, should clean the wound and see a doctor immediately

annotation.spannedText: A person who is exposed and has never been vaccinated against rabies should get 4 doses of rabies vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: A person who is exposed and has never been vaccinated against rabies should get 4 doses of rabies vaccine

annotation.spannedText: They should also get another shot called Rabies Immune Globulin at the same time as the first dose

classMention.mentionClass: They should also get another shot called Rabies Immune Globulin at the same time as the first dose

annotation.spannedText: A person who has been previously vaccinated should get 2 doses of rabies vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: A person who has been previously vaccinated should get 2 doses of rabies vaccine

annotation.spannedText: If you are moderately or severely ill, you should probably wait until you recover before getting a routine (non-exposure) dose of rabies vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: If you are moderately or severely ill, you should probably wait until you recover before getting a routine (non-exposure) dose of rabies vaccine

annotation.spannedText: If you have been exposed to rabies virus, you should get the vaccine regardless of any other illnesses you may have

classMention.mentionClass: If you have been exposed to rabies virus, you should get the vaccine regardless of any other illnesses you may have

annotation.spannedText: A vaccine, like any medicine, is capable of causing serious problems, such as severe allergic reactions

classMention.mentionClass: A vaccine, like any medicine, is capable of causing serious problems, such as severe allergic reactions

annotation.spannedText: The risk of a vaccine causing serious harm, or death, is extremely small

classMention.mentionClass: The risk of a vaccine causing serious harm, or death, is extremely small

annotation.spannedText: Serious problems from rabies vaccine are very rare

classMention.mentionClass: Serious problems from rabies vaccine are very rare

annotation.spannedText: the reaction should be reported to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS)

classMention.mentionClass: the reaction should be reported to the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System (VAERS)
